attributes.action: Bring back Boris Johnson as prime minister.
attributes.additional_details: To save our economy and restart our industries and prevent our pensions from collapsing. He is the only recent prime minister to actually achieve anything positive and the only true passionate British prime minister.
attributes.background: Bring back Boris Johnson to stabilise our economy and continue with the job he was voted in to by the British public.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or replaced.

In any case, decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
